articles.description: Hosts are joined by Cari Berget, RN, MPH, for a deep dive into her efforts to improve the implementation of the latest diabetes technologies in real-world settings through her role as a director of the PANTHER Program.

articles.title: Study Predicts Big Rise in Diabetes around the World - VOA Learning English
articles.description: A recent study paid for by the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation predicted that diabetes rates will increase in every country over the next 30 years if preventive steps are not taken.
articles.content:
A new study says that every country in the world will see diabetes rates increase in the next 30 years if preventive steps are not taken.
